sentences.en: "He's gone," Rory whispered in sepulchral tones.
sentences.cn: “他已经走了，”罗里阴沉地小声说道。
你是否听到那阴森森的音调?

sentences.en: He made his way along the sepulchral corridors.
sentences.cn: 他沿着阴森森的走廊走着。

sentences.en: Levchenko remarked that a kind of sepulchral quiet seemed to pervade the Residency.
sentences.cn: 在大门旁边的盥洗室里,列夫钦科说情报站里安静得似乎有点阴森森.

sentences.en: There was a rather sepulchral atmosphere in the room.
sentences.cn: 房间里有一种颇为阴沉的气氛.

sentences.en: There was a sepulchral atmosphere in the room.
sentences.cn: 房间里有一种“颇为”阴沉的气氛.

words.tran_cn: 坟墓；圣体安置所（等于Easter sepulchre）
阴森森的；坟墓的，丧葬的

trans.tran_cn: 坟墓的，丧葬的，阴森森的，阴沉的
